member.name: PixelOffsetMode
member.summary: The PixelOffsetMode enumeration specifies the pixel offset mode of aGraphics object. This enumeration is used by the and methods of theGraphics class.

member.name: PixelOffsetMode.PixelOffsetModeNone
member.summary: Indicates that pixel centers have integer coordinates.

member.name: PixelOffsetMode.PixelOffsetModeHalf
member.summary: Indicates that pixel centers have coordinates that are half way between integer values.
